articles.title: U.K. reports spike in child hepatitis cases amid global outbreak - Global News
articles.description: The increase in infections comes after the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control reported around 190 unexplained cases of severe hepatitis in kids around the world.
articles.content: The UK Health Security Agency has identified 34 confirmed hepatitis cases in children since Monday, bringing the total number to 145 amid a series of unexplained cases among children around the world… [+1291 chars]

articles.title: Warning of more cases of mystery hepatitis in children expected throughout Europe - Independent.ie
articles.description: More cases of mystery severe hepatitis in children, which has already struck a small number of young people in Ireland, are expected throughout Europe, a disease watchdog warned yesterday.

articles.title: Poland says countries paying for Russian gas in roubles should be penalised - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union should penalise countries that use roubles to pay for Russian gas, Poland's climate minister said, following Moscow's decision to cut off supplies to Poland and Bulgaria over their refusal to do so.
